post.body: Speaking of Khrushchev, do you remember the famous phrase that he directed to Western ambassadors in Moscow in 1956?
RT "..I don't like to draw attention to myself" Queen of the Universe, no. Queen of Denial, yes.Your name is now Cleopatra. lol
Nothing wrong with a private celebration. Just asking why do you want the whole world to join in? Don't say you don't... lol
Ignored as a child? Get over it hon, it was a long, long time ago. You're going to be 40 in twelve short years....lol haha
Why do most American women want everyone to know & acknowledge their birth day? Is it the "I'm a Princess" fantasy/delusion?
RT "normally spontaneous, sporadically planned." ok...... heyyyyyy, wait a minute, something doesn't sound right about that.
"waiting for me to show tatas" When you do, will you schedule the unveiling in advance or will it be a spontaneous kind of thing?
Amazing. I lost sleep over my use of pigeon & then you use pidgin in entirely different sense & somehow the circle completes.
I googled "pigeon French" before I tweeted and got a false positive. How are you using "pidgin" in your last tweet?
@TheMia TheMia, say it loud and there's music playing, say it soft and it's almost like praying.... uh oh was that sacrilegious?
Investor Question: How many Mustangs does it take to make a profit? Ford Answer: What's a profit?
How about an internet conference call? Damned devil is in the details here. Have Miranda read you your rights before you login.
We have a reliable witness who swore to you that you were at the scene. Would you like to appear downtown and make a statement?
hey..let's carpool down to Austin together and make it a Chapel Hill pilgrimage to the sweet fields of the Promised Land of TheMia
I heard you caught Chief Elf, Alabaster, in the sack with Mrs. Claus and could only yell, "Alabaster, I HAVE to.... but you?"
RT "Got any cool ideas of what you can make a Mustang out of?" hmmm.... I'd like to see Ford make a profit out of a Mustang.
" How does prove adoration from such a distance?" One sends me money for a new truck.That's right, no more mr.-give-it-away-free.
You adore me?.... Huh? Prove it.
You were so hurt by the egghorn correction that I let the contrarie typo go by, perhaps thinking it might be NH pigeon French thing.
Who in the freshman class is expected to shine?
Oh yeah? So is "Debbie Does Dallas" :)
Too esoteric for me. Only Oscars I know are the statue and Felix's room mate.
That's it.Induction came up as a tweet subject the other night.I used Hume's sun rising example to illustrate cause-effect problem.
Do you think that is a little high for a team that lost so many starting position players? Ackley, White & Harvey are the team.
I hate the Pajamagram commercial even more than the Jared commercial. "She'll think you spent a month planning.." I give a fuck?
All ravens are black.... until you find one that isn't. Famous problem in logic... became known as "indoor ornithology".
"Congratulations, Doc. ...." ??? Did you just make a mistweet?
Got it. Thanks. Pythagoras said ultimate reality was number. Probably was right.
LOL. Evangelize me? Probably not possible. Are you a charismatic Bible thumper illuminated by revealed Truth? :)
Ah, but I didn't tweet to you about the Truth. Just The Light and The Way. The Truth was about making people angry. RU angry?
That's only two. You said trio. :)
What trio and what breakdown? You write very cryptically :)
uh oh... or is it 5^7?
Let's rephrase: There are 5 pins, each pin can have 7 positions. So you're right! The answer would have to be 7^5.
That is a skill that can erode rapidly. Needs practice, like a learned foreign language.
Yes, that's how I awkwardly said the number of ways to take 7 things 5 at a time,but I'm not sure that is the answer to the problem.
ah! I read it as there only being only one height pin slot that could have 7 height positions.So answer is 7 factorial* 5 factorial?
NYT:NY Governor Paterson wants to pass an "obesity tax" on sweetened soft drinks ... Everyone in NY needs to call in "fat" to protest this!
Isn't 7^5 the number of ways to combine 7 things 5 at a time? I am really rusty at this.
